metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46242 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: HDF5 v1.13.1-1 was discovered to contain a heap-use-after free via thecomponent H5AC_unpin_entry.

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
insighttoolkit4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
